text: The Secret Life of Pets is an American animated movie series. There are currently two movies: The Secret Life of Pets (2016), The Secret Life of Pets 2 (2019). ==Movies== * The Secret Life of Pets (2016) * The Secret Life of Pets 2 (2019) ==Video Games== * The Secret Life of Pets: Unleashed (2016)
title: The Secret Life of Pets (franchise)
